title: Nap
description: Allows mobs to occassionally stop and take a nap under certain conditions.

cooldown_max.title: Cooldown Max
cooldown_max.description: Maximum time in seconds the mob has to wait before using the goal again.

cooldown_min.title: Cooldown Min
cooldown_min.description: Minimum time in seconds the mob has to wait before using the goal again.

mob_detect_dist.title: Mob Detect Dist
mob_detect_dist.description: The block distance in x and z that will be checked for mobs that this mob detects.

mob_detect_height.title: Mob Detect Height
mob_detect_height.description: The block distance in y that will be checked for mobs that this mob detects.

can_nap_filters.title: Can Nap Filters
can_nap_filters.description: The filters that need to be met for the nap to take place.

wake_mob_exceptions.title: Wake Mob Exceptions
wake_mob_exceptions.description: Filters that can trigger the entity to wake up from it nap.
